Body: I am using a Galaxy note [GT i9220], it has samsung account for cloud synchronization but no google account.I9220ZCLSFIt supports Chinese / Korean / English language only.using Android 4.1.2 It seems I could set up gmail through exchange synchronization which is not so efficient.Is there a way to enable google account ?Once solved, can I sync contact both to Samsung and Gooogle cloud ?UPDATE: I just want a google account for email, addressbook and calendar sync. Do I necessarily need to flash cyanogen mod to enable google account ?
Title: Chinese Galaxy note has no google account

history.Text: I am using a Galaxy note [GT i9220], it has samsung account for cloud synchronization but no google account.I9220ZCLSFIt supports Chinese / Korean / English language only.using Android 4.1.2 It seems I could set up gmail through exchange synchronization which is not so efficient.1. Is there a way to enable google account ?2. Once solved, can I sync contact both to Samsung and Gooogle cloud ?
Chinese Galaxy note has no google account

I am using a Galaxy note [GT i9220], it has samsung account for cloud synchronization but no google account.I9220ZCLSFIt supports Chinese / Korean / English language only.using Android 4.1.2 It seems I could set up gmail through exchange synchronization which is not so efficient.1. Is there a way to enable google account ?2. Once solved, can I sync contact both to Samsung and Gooogle cloud ?UPDATE: I just want a google account for email, addressbook and calendar sync. Do I necessarily need to flash cyanogen mod to enable google account ?
